title: Draven Draven 2017
body: Will Draven Draven be available for purchase when the new April fools day skins release? Hopefully it is because i missed out on last year :C

replies.body:
I don't work for Riot so i cant 100% guarantee it, but that is usually how they work with these sort of things.

So i would think theres a very very good chance that it'll be available for purchase again this year.
